long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookazon ASIN Grabber is a web plug that helps authors and book publishers to create a database  that they can use in Amazon sponsored campaigns 
The plug allows the user to easily grab ASINs from any Amazon store  with a single click.
By clicking a specific book ,Bookazon grabs :
The author name
Book name
Kindle ASIN 
Paperback ISBN 
Hardcover ISBN
Audio ASIN
The data is stored in the app and can be copied or easily exported to an Excel document.
Marketing experts can use the data to create better targeting for their Amazon marketing services campaigns and thus scale their book business.
